name: TOB_HX_SMOKE_TYPES
description: Tobacco History data for Smoking History Types that are not cigarettes.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: TOB_QUESN_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The tobacco type the data represents, same category as EPT 19211.

columns.name: TOB_HX_TYP_START_DATE
columns.description: Start date for the use of the specified tobacco type. Stored as a fuzzy date. DTE is followed with a [ followed by the precision. 1 - Year, 2 - Month, 3 - Day.

columns.name: TOB_HX_TYP_QUIT_DATE
columns.description: Quit date for the use of the specified tobacco type. Stored as a fuzzy date. DTE is followed with a [ followed by the precision of the date. 1 - Year, 2 - Month, 3 - Day.

columns.name: TOB_HX_TYP_CMT
columns.description: Comment for the specified tobacco type.
